user_query: I am planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and need help with organizing the event.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend venues that can accommodate around 50 guests for the birthday party.
Identify and suggest catering services that can handle the party size and dietary preferences.
Find entertainment options suitable for a birthday party including music, games, or performers.
Create a comprehensive checklist of tasks to ensure all aspects of the party are taken care of.
